description: Git Sync Jobs for an existing GC Git Sync solution

Description.description: The description of the Sync Job.

GitSyncServiceURL.description: Service URL of the GitSync Service.

GitSyncAccessToken.description: Access Token for the GitSync Service.

GitSyncAccessSecret.description: Access Secret for the GitSync Service.

Repository.description: Repository SSH URL of the remote source

RepositoryType.description: Repository Type of the remote source

CodeCommitAccessRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that the GitSync Service will assume.

JobID.description: A JobID is assigned to a Job on CREATE or UPDATE, Jobs are immutable.

DeployKey.description: A public key to be used to fetch the remote SSH git repository

WebhookURL.description: Webhook created by the GitSync service to trigger the Sync Job

WebhookSecret.description: Webhook Secret created by the GitSync service to trigger the Sync Job

SyncStatusURL.description: Status page created by the GitSync service to check the sync status
